sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet-async'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Users, Award, BookOpen, Globe, Lightbulb, Shield, Zap, CheckCircle, ArrowRight, Mail, Phone, MapPin, Linkedin, Twitter, Github } from 'lucide-react'; const About = () => { const teamMembers = [ { name: 'Sarah Johnson', role: 'CEO & Founder', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108755-2616b612b786?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80', bio: 'Passionate about education technology with 10+ years in EdTech.', linkedin: '#', twitter: '#' }, { name: 'Michael Chen', role: 'CTO', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80', bio: 'Full-stack developer and education enthusiast.', linkedin: '#', github: '#' }, { name: 'Emily Rodriguez', role: 'Head of Design', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1438761681033-6461ffad8d80?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80', bio: 'UX/UI designer focused on creating intuitive learning experiences.', linkedin: '#', twitter: '#' }, { name: 'David Kim', role: 'Lead Developer', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1500648767791-00dcc994a43e?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=300&q=80', bio: 'React specialist and performance optimization expert.', linkedin: '#', github: '#' } ]; const values = [ { icon: , title: 'Innovation', description: 'We constantly push the boundaries of what\'s possible in online learning and assessment.' }, { icon: , title: 'Community', description: 'Building a global community of learners who support and inspire each other.' }, { icon: , title: 'Trust', description: 'Ensuring data security and privacy while maintaining the highest quality standards.' }, { icon: , title: 'Excellence', description: 'Committed to delivering exceptional user experiences and educational outcomes.' } ]; const stats = [ { number: '50K+', label: 'Active Users' }, { number: '100K+', label: 'Quizzes Created' }, { number: '2M+', label: 'Quiz Attempts' }, { number: '95%', label: 'User Satisfaction' } ]; const milestones = [ { year: '2020', title: 'Company Founded', description: 'Started with a vision to revolutionize online learning through interactive quizzes.' }, { year: '2021', title: 'First 10K Users', description: 'Reached our first major milestone with 10,000 registered users.' }, { year: '2022', title: 'Mobile App Launch', description: 'Launched our mobile application for iOS and Android platforms.' }, { year: '2023', title: 'AI Integration', description: 'Integrated AI-powered quiz generation and personalized learning paths.' }, { year: '2024', title: 'Global Expansion', description: 'Expanded to 50+ countries with multi-language support.' } ]; return ( <> About Us - QuizMaster Pro
{/* Hero Section */}

About QuizMaster Pro

We're on a mission to make learning engaging, interactive, and accessible to everyone worldwide. Our platform empowers educators and learners to create, share, and take quizzes that truly matter.

{/* Stats Section */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.number}
{stat.label}
 ))}
{/* Mission Section */}

Our Mission

We believe that learning should be engaging, interactive, and accessible to everyone. QuizMaster Pro was born from the idea that traditional assessment methods can be transformed into dynamic, personalized learning experiences.

Our platform empowers educators to create meaningful assessments while providing learners with immediate feedback and personalized learning paths that adapt to their individual needs and pace.

Interactive Learning
Real-time Feedback
Global Accessibility
100K+
Quizzes Created
50K+
Active Users
50+
Countries
95%
Satisfaction
{/* Values Section */}

Our Values

These core values guide everything we do and shape our commitment to our users and community.

{values.map((value, index) => (
{value.icon}

{value.title}

{value.description}

))}
{/* Team Section */}

Meet Our Team

The passionate individuals behind QuizMaster Pro, working together to revolutionize online learning.

{teamMembers.map((member, index) => (

{member.name}

{member.role}

{member.bio}

{member.linkedin && ( )} {member.twitter && ( )} {member.github && ( )}
))}
{/* Timeline Section */}

Our Journey

From a small startup to a global platform, here's how we've grown and evolved.

{milestones.map((milestone, index) => (
{milestone.year}

{milestone.title}

{milestone.description}

))}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Join Our Mission?

Whether you're an educator looking to create engaging assessments or a learner seeking to test your knowledge, QuizMaster Pro has something for you.

{/* Contact Info */}

Email Us

hello@quizmasterpro.com

Call Us

+1 (555) 123-4567

Visit Us

San Francisco, CA
); }; export default About;
